feed.title: codewithcelso
feed.subtitle: Hi, my name is Celso. I am a brazilian software architect. I usually immerse my mind in computing, books and music. I've started to develop things since 9 years ago when i was a teenager and now i love to do this.

entry.title: GloboTechCast EP 54 - Hacktoberfest na Globo. Como funciona?

link.title: GloboTechCast EP 54 - Hacktoberfest na Globo. Como funciona?

entry.content:
english: In this episode i've participated together with people from tech area from Globo and we have spoken about Globo Hacktoberfest, one variation of global Hacktoberfest event.

portuguese: Neste epis칩dio eu participei junto de outras pessoas da 치rea de tecnologia na globo e falamos sobre o Hacktoberfest Globo, uma vertente do evento Hacktoberfest global.
entry.summary: english: In this episode i've participated together with people from tech area from Globo and we have spoken about Globo Hacktoberfest, one variation of global Hacktoberfest event.
